verbs.description: [ARG0: Iranian lawmakers] [V: lit] [ARG1: a paper U.S. flag on fire] [ARGM-LOC: at parliament] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] [ARGM-TMP: after President Donald Trump 's nuclear deal pullout] , [ARGM-ADV: shouting , " Death to America] ! "
[ARG0: Iranian lawmakers] lit a paper U.S. flag on fire at parliament Wednesday after President Donald Trump 's nuclear deal pullout , [V: shouting] , " [ARG1: Death to America] ! "
